name: Coders to the left, Testers to the right
body:
# QA Scenario

Test the FixtureFinder page in Chrome (desktop). Youâ€™ll work alone. The dev team is not co-located & in a different time zone.
You have 30 minutes. Then the dev team will start working.

[System Under Test](http://rest-accachallenge.rhcloud.com/resources/fixture-finder/html/FixtureFinder.html)

[Bug Tracking](https://github.com/EmbeddedTestingWorkshop/QA_FixtureFinder/issues)

If you don't have a Github account yet, quickly create one [here](https://github.com/join) or use the generic account for the workshop    EmbeddedTester    

***

# Embedded Scenario 

[Github for Embedded Scenario](https://github.com/EmbeddedTestingWorkshop/Embedded_FixtureFinder)

[How to setup Google Dev Tools](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1VxxzyMwlfwGtG7ktVwjGBms2t4ySDDCJ1gXFAoDyGWo/)

[Use Google Drive to upload your solution](https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0B2Rm2EYEiEkffmN4WTU2ak9GUi16dnU5VHhQWUhKVWJGejIzNGFodWxwLXR3eTFYeWJEeFU)

If you don't have a gooogle account, you can use the generic one    EmbeddedTesterWorkshop@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
